mapper.select:
select a.accounttype, f.branchname, a.accountid, a.accountname, b.tranamt, b.startdate, b.enddate
,c.percent as percent
from
t_account_base a
inner join T_ACCOUNT_PERSON_PLEDGE b on a.accountid=b.accountid
left join t_manager_account c on a.accountid=c.accountid
left join sys_account d on c.managerid=d.accountid
left join sys_branch f on d.branchid=f.branchid
where 1=1
and f.branchid=#{branchid}
and c.managerid=#{managerid}
and b.startdate>=#{startdate}
and b.enddate<=#{enddate}
and a.accounttype='5' and a.subaccttype='1' group by b.saleid

select a.accounttype, f.branchname, a.accountid, a.accountname, b.tranamt, b.startdate, b.enddate, b.channel, b.productbatch as productbatch, e.name as productname, c.percent as percent from
t_account_base a
inner join t_finance_detail b on a.accountid=b.accountid
left join t_manager_account c on a.accountid=c.accountid
left join sys_account d on c.managerid=d.accountid
left join t_finance_product_type e on b.productid=e.id
left join sys_branch f on a.branchid=f.branchid
where 1=1
and c.managerid=#{managerid}
and not (b.enddate<#{startdate} or b.startdate>#{enddate})
and a.accounttype in
#{item}
group by b.saleid

select b.accountname as managerid, a.percent, c.branchname from t_manager_account a left join sys_account b on a.managerid=b.accountid left join sys_branch c on b.branchid=c.branchid where a.accountid=#{accountid}
